name: Detective Agency Gray Tie - Collector's Edition
name_original: Detective Agency Gray Tie - Collector's Edition
description:
Avi Games presents the first game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. This exciting hiden object game is packed with beautiful locations, diverse and interesting ways of searching for items, as well as new mini-games.
In this mysterious detective story, you will help detectives find a stolen statuette and solve the crime.
Professional detectives Amanda and her assistant take up the case. The collector, Gino Grasso, will show you where the daring crime was committed, and you will go to Amsterdam to catch the robber. The investigation will bring you to various dangerous places. You’ll be chasing the robber together with the police and get an excellent result. The ruins of the castle and many hidden artifacts are waiting for you. The chemical laboratory will help uncover the secret of the heist and track down the robber. But when Amanda gets to the point, events will take a dramatic turn!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
8 extra locations with even more things to find!
8 more mini-games to complete!
Downloadable wallpapers!
Listen to soundtracks!
Add the exclusive achievement your storage!
